sentences.en: a space probe on its way to Jupiter
sentences.cn: 飞向木星的一个太空探测器

sentences.en: After the Jupiter flyby , a silicon chip failed, wiping out three percent of the computer's memory.
sentences.cn: 飞过木星以后, 一块硅片失效了, 抹掉计算机存储的百分之三.

sentences.en: Asteroid lies between Mars and Jupiter.
sentences.cn: 小行星位于火星与木星之间.

sentences.en: Bob turned over to sleep again, wondering how Jupiter and Pete were making out.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃一面挂念着丘辟特和皮特的生活状况，一面转身又去睡了。

sentences.en: How many moons does Jupiter have?
How many moons has the planet Jupiter?
Jupiter is unlike the Earth in almost every way.
sentences.cn: 木星与地球几乎完全不同.

sentences.en: Jupiter shortened the spring, and divided the year into four seasons.
sentences.cn: 朱庇特缩短了春天, 把一年分为四季.

sentences.en: Jupiter'smoon Io, whose density is 3.5 grams per cubic centimetre, is all rock.
sentences.cn: 密度为每立方厘米3.5克的木星卫星木卫一上遍布岩石。

sentences.en: Not only with immortals but with mortals were Jupiter's relations sometimes of a dubious character.
sentences.cn: 朱庇特不仅跟神祗有私情,和凡人也常常关系暧昧.

sentences.en: Oh, by Jupiter, and talking of Ben Gunn ! why this is the mischief in person.
sentences.cn: 哦, 对了, 说到本-刚 恩,这真是恶作剧的化身.

sentences.en: She wrote important studies of the planets Jupiter and Saturn.
sentences.cn: 她写了几篇关于木星和土星的重要学术论文.

sentences.en: The astronomers were taking an observation of Jupiter.
sentences.cn: 天文学家们正在观测木星.

sentences.en: The guide showed us a colossal statue of Jupiter, in the Vatican.
sentences.cn: 在梵蒂冈,向导领我们参观了一座朱庇特巨像.

sentences.en: The planet Jupiter may have no solid surface at all.
sentences.cn: 木星表面可能根本就不是固体的。

sentences.en: Third and last on the throne of the highest god sat Zeus ( or Jupiter ).
sentences.cn: 宙斯 ( 朱庇特 ) 是第三位,也是最后一位众神之王,在希腊众神中地位最高.

trans.tran_en: the planet that is fifth in order from the sun and is the largest in the solar system
